pr_title: Clarify how to configure Kafka connector

timeline.message:
Clarify how to configure Kafka connector

This was unclear to me and took a little while
to figure out, so want to save others the trial
and error.

timeline.bodyText: Although this is the default and the example works without setting this, it is useful to point out so someone can get up and running connected to a different host or port quickly
